events.title: Witta Market
events.description: The monthly Witta Market features fresh local produce, handmade crafts, and delicious food. Come explore all that Witta has to offer!

events.title: Sunday Brunch Market
events.description: Join us for a Sunday brunch market featuring a diverse range of food stalls, coffee, and local vendors.

events.title: Witta Community Carols
events.location: Good Shepherd Lutheran Church, 295 Witta Road
events.description: Celebrate the festive season with carols, community, and joy. A family-friendly event for all ages.

events.title: Witta Wunderland Christmas Celebration
events.description: A magical afternoon of live music, food, petting zoo, pony rides, face painting, and family-friendly fun.

events.title: Maleny Farm Fest
events.description: A community-driven event celebrating small-scale farming and local agriculture. (Past Event - included for reference)

events.title: Transformations: Old Made New
events.description: An art exhibition showcasing creative transformations of recycled materials. (Past Event - included for reference)
